headline: Carlisle Prices Senior Notes Offering Worth $1B in Aggregate
summary: CSL prices $1B in senior notes to fund debt repayment, capital spending, buybacks and acquisitions.

raw.headline: Carlisle Prices Senior Notes Offering Worth $1B in Aggregate
raw.summary: CSL prices $1B in senior notes to fund debt repayment, capital spending, buybacks and acquisitions.

headline: Solventum Announces Pricing of Secondary Offering of Common Stock
summary: Solventum Corporation (NYSE: SOLV) (the "Company" or "Solventum") today announced the pricing of the previously announced secondary offering (the "Offering") of 8,800,000 shares of its common stock, which is expected to result in gross proceeds of approximately $648 million to 3M Company (the "Selling Shareholder"). All of the shares of common stock are being sold by the Selling Shareholder, and Solventum will not receive any of the proceeds from the Offering. The Offering is expected to close o
